data.text: We had a wonderful stay at the Rodos Palladium from October 23 to 30. We were 3 people. Our daughter had her own double room for single use with sea view. The food was again excellent, although not quite as sumptuous as during our stay in 2022, but this only concerned the quantity, not the choice of food. We enjoyed being looked after by Marietta at breakfast and dinner. Here you can feel hospitality in action. We made extensive use of the yoga program. It was conducted by the external service provider Shanti Now for hotel guests free of charge. Due to the season, there were more than enough sunbeds at the pool (very cold) and at the sea (much warmer). We will visit the hotel again.
data.title: another wonderful stay

data.text:
I have never written a review before, but had to write one, after experiencing an amazing week at this amazing hotel.
Great rooms (we stayed in an executive room with a private pool) amazing grounds, every square inch is being looked after and cleaned.
The staff is always helpful and looked after us. We had special dietary requirements and the staff went above and beyond. Amazing value for money.
Special shout-out to guest relations, who are professional and always helpful. I will be recommending this stay to anyone who wants to go to Greece
data.title: Superb hotel with amazing staff

data.text: It is a very good hotel at the excellent location. But what surprised us the most was the fantastic service! We were upgraded to the better room (free of charge), got some pleasant gifts from the hotel (massage, dinner, greek starters at the beach bar and a small tasty souvenirs on the departure day). And, of course, employees at this beautiful hotel were so attentive and ready to help! Hotel itself is in a very good condition - we enjoyed every minute being here (good sleep, big and beautiful lobby, breakfast was really of the highest level (fruits, meat, fish, pastry and cookies, greek food). It was our first visit to Greece and to this hotel. And we will be back
data.title: Great vacation with Palladium
